label.value: Decimal Places
Controls how accurately numbers are stored in the resulting output. A smaller number reduces output size and accuracy.
Expand Symbols
Controls which symbols will be expanded in the output. 'None' results in the smallest output size, 'All' results in the largest file but has potential performance benefits.
'Once Used' will only expand symbols which are only used once and is the recommended setting.
Convert Patterns to Symbols
Whether repeating bitmaps should be exported as reused symbols.
Flatten motion tweens
Should every frame be exported in tweens or just keyframes. Sometimes this can help the animations match those in flash more accurately.
Fixed FPS
When checked any easing between frames is turned off, resulting in an animation matching the FPS listed in flash.
Loop full timeline tweens
Will attempt to seemlessly animate the end of a tween back into it's beginning. Only applies when Fixed FPS is not being used.
Remove Groups
Removes unrequired groups from the SVG hierarchy, reducing output file size.
Compact Output
Removes whitespace from the output file, resulting in a smaller but less readable SVG file.
Use Animated viewbox
This option allows for a rectangle to be animated as part of the timeline which will then be considered the viewport into the scene. The clip should have the instance name 'viewbox'
Show Final Frame
When animation is not running, you can optionally show the final frame. This will also be the state shown in browsers that don't support SMIL.
